title: Rihanna just made another iconic move with the announcement of her coffee table book
text:
Take all our money, Rihanna!

The book titled RIHANNA will chronicle her life as a musician, performer, designer, and entrepreneur. The visual autobiography will contain more than 1000 images from throughout the singer's life. Many of the photos will also offer fans an intimate never-before-seen look into the star's everyday life.

"We've been working on the book for over five years and I'm really happy to be able to share it with everybody," Rihanna said in a statement.

The book will be released on 24 October 2019 by Phaidon.

Compiled by Afika Jadezweni
